project.title: codewars-node-api
project.description: unofficial library written in TS to interact with codewars public api

pageProps.markdown:
codewars-node-api

This project is a simple nodejs utility written in TypeScript that connects to codewars' public api. Its used within this portfolio to load some basic stats from codewars.

The project is open-sourced and available from here

Download it with:

npm i codewars-node-api

latest version information should be [here] (https://www.npmjs.com/package/codewars-node-api)
